resources.string: Are you sure you want to end the game?

Welcome to MIF(Make It Fast),\n
The game work as follows: The group of players is divided in teams of 2 or more players. When the game is started one player of one team has the playdevice in his/her hand. He/she is shown words which he/she has to explain to his/her teammates without naming the word. This has to be done in an amount of time. When time expands he/she can click on the words which his/her team guessed and click next. Then the scoreboard pops up and the first player has to hand the playdevice to the next player. When clicked next again the game starts again with different words.
the purpose of this game is to score more points with your teams than the other teams. The game ends when clicked stop or all the words are shown.
